jd: From: Sam, Vyze1 inc slenka@vyzeinc.com Reply to: slenka@vyzeinc.com ob Description -Title: Drools Java DeveloperLocation: McLean, VA | onsite| Relocation is allowedMOI: Skype VISA: USC/GC/ GC EAD/H1B Rate: $50/hr on C2C (max) Client: Hexaware/FreddiemacNeed LinkedIn & Pass port number, just to find out travel historyNOTE:- Drools is a Business Rules Management System (BRMS) solution.
